title: x0x Gaming (LF Diamond + Players)
body:
Hello Community 

I am interested in 5 Diamond + Players to join x0x Gaming.

We will try and push the team to diamond/challenger in the OCE 5's Ladder. I will be coaching/analyst for the team.

Looking for:
ADC:
Support:
Mid: 
Top:
Jungle:

Sub's:
Sub 1: Fragnanncee 
Sub 2:
Sub 3:

If anyone is interested in joining the requirements are Diamond 5 + and must main the role which you are applying for (There will be trials for each roles.)
Once the team is set up i will be coaching the team and trying to strive for the challenger ladder.

Add my IGN: Fragnanncee if interested
